short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Integrates with both JIRA cloud and JIRA server, allows to import tickets into AgileMana and sync results back to JIRA.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AgileMana JIRA Assistant, allows users to easily create rooms, add JIRA tickets and sync points back to JIRA.
